title: The Mighty Adventures of Oscar Bennett
summary: Oscar Bennett, a 52-year-old guide, discovers his ability to control time and uses it to protect his city over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Oscar Bennett, ein 52-jähriger Führer, entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, die Zeit zu kontrollieren, und verwendet sie, um seine Stadt im Laufe einer Woche zu schützen.
summaryDutch: Oscar Bennett, een 52-jarige gids, ontdekt zijn vermogen om de tijd te beheersen en gebruikt dit om zijn stad te beschermen gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Oscar Bennett, un guide de 52 ans, découvre sa capacité à contrôler le temps et l'utilise pour protéger sa ville au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Oscar Bennett finds an ancient clock in the depths of the city museum's basement, where he guides tours. Touching it, he feels a surge of energy and suddenly realizes he can control time.
Testing his new powers, Oscar stops time to save a child from a falling tree during a tour. His actions go unnoticed due to his control over time.
Oscar experiments more, but feels lonely as he moves through the frozen world. He starts doubting whether his power should be used, considering its implications.
He encounters another time manipulator, creating confusing time loops around the city. Oscar resolves to confront and stop this new threat.
During the time-stopped duel, Oscar discovers the other manipulator is his long-lost twin, driven by anger and pain. They share a moment of understanding.
Oscar and his twin use their powers in tandem to prevent a giant catastrophe, rescuing the city from an impending earthquake by pausing and redirecting seismic energy.
Celebrating their heroism, the twins host a guided tour of the city they saved, explaining their powers and achievements to the townsfolk, fostering a sense of community and safety.

ending: As the sun set on a grateful city, Oscar Bennett felt a new sense of purpose, ready to guide both time and people toward a safe future.
moral: The true power lies not in what we can do alone, but in what we can achieve together.
